locations.msg: tainted value is used to perform a security-sensitive operation
this value can be controlled by the user

issues.message: Refactor this code to not perform redirects based on tainted, user-controlled data.

comments.htmlText: Hard to exploit: require a POST method to trigger the redirect. Also, the source of the injection is the Referer header which is generaly set by the web browser
comments.markdown: Hard to exploit: require a POST method to trigger the redirect. Also, the source of the injection is the Referer header which is generaly set by the web browser
